title: Pakistan Signs Deal With US to Revamp NYC’s Roosevelt Hotel
description: Pakistan agreed to work with the US to revamp the Roosevelt Hotel in Manhattan, marking a step forward in its plans to re-purpose a building once dubbed the “New Ellis Island” for its role in sheltering migrants.
content: Pakistan agreed to work with the US to revamp the Roosevelt Hotel in Manhattan, marking a step forward in its plans to re-purpose a building once dubbed the “New Ellis Island” for its role in sheltering migrants.
